Description: Rim of Roman pottery mortarium. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.173, 34. Name, Lupercus. The owner of the establishment(s) is known from other stamps, but this slave is not otherwise recorded; see S. Pallecchi, I mortaria di produzione centro-italica; corpus dei bolli (Rome, 2002), 152-5.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IF.132)
